definition: long sleeves help one dance beautifully (idiom); money and power will help you in any occupation

sentences.english: I had an alb on and a long robe with long sleeves.
sentences.chinese: 我穿着白袍，一件帶長袖的長袍。

sentences.english: A selection of long- sleeved casual shirts featuring contemporary and classic styles.
sentences.chinese: 精選的長袖休閒襯衫採用現代和古典風格。

sentences.english: That long - sleeve blouse fits you well.
Men should wear a collared, long-sleeve white shirt with a conservative tie.
sentences.chinese: 男士應穿着白色有領長袖襯衫，並繫上領帶。

sentences.english: For the men, the common traditional outfits are the Kurta Pajamas.
sentences.chinese: 至於男子，常見的傳統服裝是無領長袖服裝。

sentences.english: Let me know the price of the Tshirts and jackets of the long sleeves.
sentences.chinese: 讓我知道價格的t恤衫和夾克的長袖衫。

sentences.english: Susanna wears a sweater and trousers today.
sentences.chinese: 蘇珊娜今天穿了件長袖衫和褲子。

sentences.english: You can try using a moisturizer or cream -- or wearing long-sleeved shirts.
sentences.chinese: 使用潤膚霜，精華霜，或者乾脆穿長袖吧。

sentences.english: The sergeant lay in his dirty long-sleeved underwear .
sentences.chinese: 軍曹躺在那兒，只穿着一件髒了的長袖內衣。

sentences.english: Fleece goes in the bag. Repeat with countless other items.
sentences.chinese: 長袖衫入袋，無數其他物品接踵而來。

sentences.english: Cover your skin with tightly woven long-sleeved shirts, long pants and wide-brimmed hats.
sentences.chinese: 穿織的密一些的長袖襯衫，長褲子和寬邊帽子。

sentences.english: Every year after Bailu (shortly before or after September 8th), people begin to wear long-sleeved clothes.
sentences.chinese: 露以後，就要穿長袖的衣服了。

sentences.english: A woman's dress style that imitates the caftan cloaks worn by men in the near east.
sentences.chinese: 模仿近東男士穿的長袖外衣的一種女士衣服。

sentences.english: Long-sleeve base layer and a vest keep your core warm.
sentences.chinese: 長袖做底再加個背心來爲胸腹保暖。

sentences.english: I want you to send me links for women and babies with long sleeves.
sentences.chinese: 我希望你給我寄來連接嬰兒和女性長袖衫。

sentences.english: Infirmity suitable long sleeve shirt and pants.
sentences.chinese: 年老體弱者宜着長袖襯衫和單褲。
